org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.plant.impl

Interface MetricsTimer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DummyMetricsTimer, MetricsTimerImpl

    public interface MetricsTimer
    A metrics Timer, that also tracks failures.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long nanos()
      Returns the current time tick.
      void updateNanos(long nanos, boolean success)
      Adds a recorded duration in nanoseconds.

    • Method Detail

      • nanos

        long nanos()
        Returns the current time tick.
        Returns:
        time tick in nanoseconds

      • updateNanos

        void updateNanos(long nanos,
               boolean success)
        Adds a recorded duration in nanoseconds.
        Parameters:
        nanos - the length of the duration in nanoseconds
        success - True, if the execution succeeded.
